# Catheter Rotation Tracker App

This is a React Native iOS application for managing insulin pump catheter placement rotation. The app helps diabetes patients track where they last applied their catheter and suggests optimal next placement locations.

## Project Guidelines

- Focus on medical device safety and user-friendly design
- Implement robust data persistence for catheter history
- Ensure clear visual indicators for placement locations
- Prioritize accessibility and ease of use for daily management
- Follow iOS Human Interface Guidelines for medical apps

## Features

- Track catheter placement locations (8 body zones)
- Maintain historical records of all placements
- Smart suggestion algorithm for next optimal location
- Visual body map for easy location selection
- Data export capabilities for medical consultations
